QuestData.Title: The Power of Corruption
QuestData.Description: The time has come at last.$B$BDeep within the cavernous underbelly of Karazhan lies a long-forgotten chamber. Based on what you learned from our demon friend, I believe this is where its mistress dwells.$B$BThis demon's master must come from the highest ranks of the Burning Legion. This does not bode well for Karazhan.$B$BWe need to secure Deadwind Pass, $n.$B$BYou must find this demon and destroy it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the disguise to gain access to the chamber, then slay Thar'zul and Elux'ara Darkscorn beneath Karazhan in Deadwind Pass.
